name: Illustrative Annual Incentive Projection for Mutual Fund Distributors- On New (new-PAN) B-30 Bharat & Investors On-Boarding for Mutual Fund (Illustrative)
description: Illustrative annual projection of SEBI's new additional incentives for Mutual Fund Distributors under the November 2025 circular. The model assumes that first-year SIP incentives are treated as a recurring monthly cashflow pattern for 12 months for projection purposes. Actual incentive is a one-time 1% on first-year SIP contribution, subject to circular conditions.

sourceOrganization.name: Securities and Exchange Board of India

isPartOf.description: This block provides an educational and exam-focused decoding of SEBI’s November 27, 2025 circular using the RegDEEP™ framework. It is not an official SEBI communication.
